body.en: Your payment of {amount} ETB for '{property_title}' in {location} was successful. Thank you!
body.am: ክፍያዎ {amount} ብር ለ'{property_title}' በ{location} ተሳክቷል። እናመሰግናለን!
body.om: Kaffaltiin keessan {amount} ETB '{property_title}' {location} keessatti milkaa'eera. Galatoomaa!

body.en: Your payment of {amount} ETB for '{property_title}' in {location} failed. Please try again.
body.am: ክፍያዎ {amount} ብር ለ'{property_title}' በ{location} አልተሳካም። እባክዎ እንደገና ይሞክሩ።
body.om: Kaffaltiin keessan {amount} ETB '{property_title}' {location} keessatti hin milkoofne. Irra deebi'aa yaalaa.

body.en: Your listing '{property_title}' in {location} has been approved and is now live!
body.am: የእርስዎ ዝርዝር '{property_title}' በ{location} ጸድቋል እና አሁን ቀጥታ ነው።
body.om: Tarreen keessan '{property_title}' {location} keessatti mirkanaa'ee jira, amma online jira!

body.en: Update for your listing '{property_title}': A tenant named {tenant_name} is interested.
body.am: ለዝርዝርዎ '{property_title}' ማሻሻያ: {tenant_name} የሚባል ተከራይ ፍላጎት አለው።
body.om: Tarree keessan '{property_title}' irratti odeeffannoo haaraa: Kirreessaan maqaan isaa {tenant_name} jedhamu fedhii qaba.

body.en: A new listing '{property_title}' is available in {location} matching your preferences.
body.am: አዲስ ዝርዝር '{property_title}' በ{location} ምርጫዎችዎ ጋር የሚዛመድ ይገኛል።
body.om: Tarree haaraa '{property_title}' {location} keessatti fedhii keessaniif argama.
